eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Illinois; at 09:15 AM ON JAN 6, 2026 Effective until 10:15 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the required Monthly Test of the Emergency Alert System originated by the Illinois Emergency Management Agency IEMA. Rebroadcast within 1 hour.
